task.title: Step4. Connect BranchA PBX and Headquarter PBX
task.shortdesc: Set the role of the BranchA PBX as Branch, and connect to the headquarter PBX. Users can make internal calls between the branch office A and the headquarter.

step.cmd: Log in the web interface of the BranchA PBX, go to Settings Multisite Interconnect .
Click Branch Office to set the PBX as a branch PBX.
Create an interconnection to the headquarter PBX.

substep.cmd: Click Add to add an interconnection.
Enter the IP/domain and SIP port of the headquarter PBX.
Enter the branch ID and password that were set on the headquarter PBX for branch office A.

step.stepresult:
If the interconnection status shows , the branch PBX is connected to the headquarter PBX.
The users in Branch Office A and the Headquarter Office can make internal calls.
